input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
Pavilion Gift Company 19062 Light Your Way Memorial Forever in Our Hearts Angel Figurine, 4-1/2-Inch

Product specifications:
Reads "Forever in our hearts"
High quality polyresin construction
Comes in an attractive gift box
Memorial Gift
input_text.Response A: The Pavilion Gift Company Light Your Way Memorial Forever in Our Hearts Angel Figurine is a beautiful and heartwarming memorial gift for someone who has lost a loved one. The angel figurine is made of high quality polyresin and features a gentle expression and a serene pose. The figurine is inscribed with the touching words "Forever in our hearts" and comes in an attractive gift box. This angel figurine is a thoughtful and comforting gift for someone who has lost a loved one and is dealing with grief.
input_text.Response B: This beautiful angel figurine makes a touching memorial gift, featuring the sentiment "Forever in our Hearts." Crafted of high quality polyresin, this 4-1/2-inch figurine is delicately detailed and beautifully painted, and comes in an attractive gift box.

label_annotations.factors_a: It comes across very sincere, surprisingly so for a chatbot.
label_annotations.factors_b: It is basic but straight to the point.
